name: RemoteHQ
description: A niche remote job board that aggregates remote job listings and allows companies to post paid job listings. Features job search, filtering, email alerts, and a B2B monetization model.

userStories.title: Project Setup and Configuration
userStories.description: Initialize Next.js 14 project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Supabase client, and Stripe integration. Set up project structure with proper folder organization.
acceptanceCriteria: Next.js 14 project created with App Router
Supabase client configured with environment variables
Folder structure: src/app, src/components, src/lib, src/types

userStories.title: Database Schema Design
userStories.description: Create Supabase database schema for jobs, companies, categories, and user subscriptions with proper indexes and RLS policies.
acceptanceCriteria: Jobs table with: id, company_id, title, description, salary_min, salary_max, location, job_type, category, tags, apply_url, is_featured, is_active, posted_at, expires_at
Companies table with: id, name, logo_url, website, description, is_verified
Categories table with: id, name, slug, icon
Job alerts table with: id, email, filters (jsonb), frequency, is_active
RLS policies for public read access to active jobs

userStories.title: TypeScript Types and Database Utilities
userStories.description: Create TypeScript type definitions for database tables and utility functions for Supabase queries.
acceptanceCriteria: Job, Company, Category, JobAlert types defined
Supabase client utility with lazy loading pattern
Query helper functions for common operations

userStories.title: Homepage with Job Listings
userStories.description: Build the main homepage displaying job listings with a hero section, search bar, and paginated job cards showing company logo, job title, salary, location, and tags.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section with headline and search bar
Job cards showing: company logo, job title, company name, salary range, location, tags, posted date

userStories.title: Job Search and Filtering
userStories.description: Implement advanced job search with filters for category, job type, salary range, and location. Include URL-based filter state for shareable searches.
acceptanceCriteria: Job type filter (full-time, part-time, contract, freelance)
Salary range filter with min/max inputs

userStories.title: Job Detail Page
userStories.description: Create dynamic job detail page showing full job information, company details, and apply button.
acceptanceCriteria: Full job description with markdown support
Company sidebar with logo, name, website link
Apply button linking to external application
Share job buttons (Twitter, LinkedIn, copy link)

userStories.title: Company Profiles
userStories.description: Build company profile pages showing company information and all their job listings.
acceptanceCriteria: Company header with logo, name, website, description
List of all active jobs from company

userStories.title: Job Alert Subscriptions
userStories.description: Allow users to subscribe to job alerts via email with customizable filters and frequency.
acceptanceCriteria: Filter selection for alerts (category, job type, keywords)

userStories.title: Post a Job Form (Company Side)
userStories.description: Create a multi-step job posting form for companies with job details, company info, and preview.
acceptanceCriteria: Multi-step form: Job Details -> Company Info -> Preview -> Payment
Job fields: title, description (rich text), category, job type, salary, location, tags, apply URL
Company fields: name, logo upload, website, description

userStories.title: Stripe Payment Integration
userStories.description: Integrate Stripe for job posting payments with different pricing tiers (basic, featured, premium).
acceptanceCriteria: Lazy-loaded Stripe client for Vercel compatibility

userStories.title: Admin Dashboard
userStories.description: Build an admin dashboard for managing jobs, companies, and viewing analytics.
acceptanceCriteria: Jobs management: approve, edit, delete, feature
Analytics overview: total jobs, views, applications

userStories.title: SEO and Performance Optimization
userStories.description: Optimize for search engines with proper meta tags, structured data, sitemap, and performance improvements.
acceptanceCriteria: Dynamic meta tags for all pages
JSON-LD structured data for job postings

userStories.title: Job Scraping API Integration
userStories.description: Create API routes to aggregate jobs from external sources and RSS feeds to populate the job board.
acceptanceCriteria: Support for common job board APIs
RSS feed parser for job aggregation
Cron job setup for scheduled imports

userStories.title: Landing Page and Marketing
userStories.description: Create compelling landing page for employers with pricing, testimonials, and clear CTAs to post jobs.
acceptanceCriteria: Clear CTA buttons to start posting
